job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Job Title: Machine Learning Engineer<br><br>Location: South San Francisco, CA<br><br>Duration: Long Term<br><br><strong><u>Skills<br><br></u></strong>Demonstrated experience with deep learning frameworks and models (PyTorch is preferred).<br><br>Proficient in Python.<br><br>Demonstrated experience in software development, GPU acceleration, model optimization and scaling for multiple server nodes.<br><br>Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
